name: Music Reports
tag_list: music-licensing, royalty, music-copyright, publishing, broadcast, accounting, transactions, legal, music
overview:
Located in Woodland Hills, CA, Music Reports is the leading provider of music rights administration services in the United States.

The company was founded in 1995, and its key executives have hundreds of years of experience. Since its inception, Music Reports’ IT-centric approach to music rights administration has set the standard for technological innovation in the music industry. The company has developed proprietary databases and software applications which facilitate accuracy, transparency, and accountability for all aspects of music rights administration.

The company’s core asset is SongdexÂ®, the world’s largest independent relational database of music copyright and related business information.

Music Reports offers a full spectrum of music rights administration services to clients including strategic consulting, copyright research, licensing, and royalty reporting. The company’s clients include the world’s most successful broadcasters, record labels, digital music services, wireless carriers, and consumer products companies.

Music Reports is a portfolio company of ABRY partners, one of North America’s leading private equity investment firms, which is focused on media and business information services.

relationships.title: Senior Vice President, Business Affairs and Business Development
